author: Julia Alexander
title: Lo-fi beats to quarantine to are booming on YouTube
description: People trying to be productive or find others online who are looking for community are doing so in lo-fi chillhop communities. Channels are seeing massive booms in views and subscribers.
content:
People are trying to be productive and find a community 
YouTubes lo-fi hip-hop community has for years offered a place to virtually gather, do homework, and find comfort in the random messages of strangers that populate in live chats. Now, as were all stuck… [+5642 chars]
